title: Fragment, 1401–25
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic
Technique: cut supplementary warp loops in 4&1 satin foundation with brocaded wefts bound in 2/1 twill by supplementary warps
description: Swinging branches with pomegranite, fruit and blossoms in green and metallic.

Fragment, 1401–25.
1401–25. Medium: silk, metallic
Technique: cut supplementary warp loops in 4&1 satin foundation with brocaded wefts bound in 2/1 twill by supplementary warps. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-876-a/g.
